text: so I've been working on infinity from my
whole career since I was a graduate
student or even before so the trouble
with infinity is it's a big subject and
there are lots of questions for the most
troublesome troublesome part of it is
that we know that from the principles
that we have we can't solve the problems
that we're trying to solve that we know
that for example the problem with the
Continuum Hypothesis is unsolvable so
that means we have to deal with another
dimension of the issue and that is what
would it mean to find a solution and
maybe it has no solution maybe that's
just the nature of this of the subject
so whereas in mathematics usually you're
trying to do a calculation or come up
with an answer you never questioned the
principles from which you're working
whereas in in the subject of infinity we
don't yet have all the principles to
solve the problems that we're working on
[Music]
